sub_title: Independent sr Brand Strategist and Business Coach
summary:
Over 25 years comprehensive leadership and consultancy experience with multi-site multi-cultural global organizations including FMCG, B2B, Pharmaceuticals and Consumer Healthcare, . 

• Proven experience and delivery track record in brand and digital strategy, innovation and creativity.
• Delivering digital solutions that reach 5+ million unique visitors monthly, global brand and activation campaigns, multisite patient platforms serving over a million patients in Europe, UK, US, Asia & Australia using both traditional and cloud CMS-es including launches across many geographical markets.
• Creator of the actionable brand success method, actionable sales success method and actionable advertising success method. 
• An understanding, innovative and enthusiastic individual who has an excellent sense of teamwork to get results by instilling strategic vision, commitment, trust, transparency and loyalty to team members. 
• An award winning and accomplished, resourceful, well connected, hands on leader within the creative and digital domain. 

Specialties: brand strategy, brand experiences, CEO, business development, board member

Fun facts: Drove an oldtimer camper van from Amsterdam to Beijing China, met a US president, the Dalai Lama, introduced QR codes in the Netherlands, built an agency, won over 50 awards and sold it successfully, author of UXequity, the actionable brand success method and the travel book Destination Beijing (Bestemming Beijing). 

Got curious? Feel free to contact me anytime.

Michel van Velde

awards.title: Nominated for top 50 most influential people in the Dutch advertising industry
awards.description: Nomimated to the top50 out of 100 most influential people in the Dutch Advertising Industry. https://www.marketingreport.nl/Reclamebureau100-2023-De-Genomineerden/

awards.title: Winner Gold DIA Dutch Interactive Award
awards.description: Winner of the gold Dutch Interactive Award (DIA) for Postcovid.nl. PostCovidNL is the patient website that helps everyone with long-term complaints after corona to get a grip on their life. In a way that suits them. So that they can move forward. The Dutch Interactive Awards (DIA) are the prizes for the very best interactive work by Dutch makers.

awards.title: Nominated for top 50 most influential people in the Dutch advertising industry
awards.description: Nominated to the top 50 out of 100 most influential people in the Dutch advertising industry. The eight edition of the dinner and the announcement of DeMedia100 took place on Thursday 6 December in Barbizon Palace in Amsterdam.

awards.title: Winner Website of the Year 2018 - Thuisarts (GP at home)
awards.description:
Winner Website of the Year 2018 - Thuisarts (GP at home). Thuisarts is the number one public health information website in the Netherlands. Thuisarts provides evidence-based, reliable and understandable medical information to the public. 

Since its launch in 2012, the website has grown to become one of the most visited healthcare websites in the Netherlands with more than 4 million unique page views per month. According to scientific research in the British Medical Journal, the public health site leads to 12 percent less GP consultations and 90% of the GPs in The Netherlands use Thuisarts as a supportive tool during their consultations.

awards.title: Winner 2 Lovie Awards for Thuisarts.nl (GP at Home)
awards.description: Thuisarts.nl (GP at Home) has been selected as the winner in the category Health & Fitness out of more than 1,500 registrations from 33 countries - for both the public award and the jury prize. The professional jury, The International Academy of Digital Arts and Sciences, appreciated Thuisarts.nl with the Lovie Award.

awards.title: Winner Web Awards 2018 - My DHL parcel - best transportation website
awards.description: Winner Winner Web Awards 2018 with My DHLParcel - best transportation website. https://dhlparcel.oneshoe.com. Since 1997, the Web Marketing Association's annual WebAward Competition has been setting the standard of excellence for Website development. Independent expert judges from around the world review sites in 96 industries. The best are recognized with a WebAward which helps interactive professionals promote themselves, their companies, and their best work to the outside world. The WebAward Competition is the premier award recognition program for Web developers and advertising agencies.

awards.title: Winner Digital Communication Award for Best European Content Platform 2018
awards.description:
Winner Digital Communication Award for Thuisarts.nl (GP at home)
Out of more than 700 candidates, Thuisarts.nl was voted Best European Content Platform 2018 by the jury of the Digital Communication Awards in Berlin. Thuisarts.nl is developed by the Dutch General Practitioners Association (NHG) in collaboration with creative & digital agency One Shoe. The Digital Communication Awards honours outstanding projects, campaigns and innovations in the field of online communication.

awards.title: Winner Gold Digital Impact Award for Best Intranet
awards.description:
Winner Gold digital Impact Award for Best Intranet
For Espria, one of the largest healthcare organizations in the Netherlands, One Shoe created an empowering new intranet service. With the business consisting of over 12 brands and with 18.000 employees – including nursing staff, doctors, purchasers and policy advisors among others – creating the new intranet was no small task. “But” said to the jury, “One Shoe more than came through with the goods, delivering ‘Digital Work Space’, a truly transformative tool. It’s practical and with impressive uptake.”

awards.title: Winner Gold Digital Impact Award for My DHL parcel
awards.description:
Winner Gold Award for Best Use of Digital in the Logistics Sector
My DHL Parcel has been chosen by the jury as the best use of digital in the transport and logistics sector. The transport and digital sector relies on digital communications to achieve logistical success. DHL Parcel partnered with One Shoe to streamline its parcel service into one easy package: an app. The jury: “My DHL Parcel offers a raft of sought after features delivered through a state-of-the-art and future-proof single page design.”

awards.title: Winner 7 Communicator Awards
awards.description:
Two projects of creative and digital agency One Shoe have been awarded seven Communicator Awards this year: the work for My DHL Parcel and for Thuisarts (GP at Home). The Communicator Awards is an annual competition honoring the best digital, mobile, audio, video, and social content the industry has to offer. 

The Communicator Awards is the leading international awards program honouring creative excellence for marketing and communications professionals. The Communicator Awards is widely recognised as one of the largest awards of its kind in the world.

Academy of Interactive and Visual Arts (AIVA)
The Communicator Awards are judged and overseen by the Academy of Interactive and Visual Arts (AIVA), a 600+ member organisation of leading professionals from various disciplines of the visual arts and working at organisations such as Republica, Sesame Workshop, MTV, Starbucks, Time Inc and Tribal DDB. One Shoe has won two Gold Awards of Excellence and five Silver Awards of Distinction:

Gold
My DHL Parcel

- Award of Excellence for Best Web Application 
- Award of Excellence for Best User Experience

Silver
My DHL Parcel

- Award of Distinction for Best Transportation Website
- Award of Distinction for Best Structure/Navigation

Thuisarts 

- Award of Distinction for Best Health Website
- Award of Distinction for Best User Experience
- Award of Distinction for Best Structure/Navigation

awards.title: Winner Lovie Award 2017 'Best Structure/Navigation' – My DHL Parcel
awards.description:
My DHL Parcel has won a Lovie Award in the categorie “Best Navigation/Structure”. The Lovie Awards, presented by the International Academy of Digital Arts and Sciences (IADAS), is the most prestigious honour in Europe for excellence across websites, online advertising, internet video, mobile sites, apps & podcasts and social.

My DHL Parcel is an advanced web application that merges a large number of existing DHL products into just one advanced yet easy-to-use shipping service. The result is an intuitive web application based on the latest technology for sending large amounts of commercial shipments.

awards.title: Winner Lovie Award 2017 ‘Best Web Services / Applicatons’ – My DHL Parcel
awards.description:
My DHL Parcel has won a Lovie Award in the category “Websites, Web Services & Applications”. The Lovie Awards are also called the Oscars of the European Web and, like the Webby Awards, form part of the International Academy of Digital Arts and Sciences.

My DHL Parcel is an advanced web application that merges a large number of existing DHL products into just one advanced yet easy-to-use shipping service. The result is an intuitive web application based on the latest technology for sending large amounts of commercial shipments.

awards.title: Nominee Website of the Year Award 2017 - Thuisarts (GP at Home)
awards.description:
Thuisarts (GP at home) has been nominated in 2017 for the third time (2014, 2016, 2017) for the Website of the Year Award. The Website of the Year award is the online annual election of the greatest websites out there.

Thuisarts is the number one public health information website in the Netherlands. Thuisarts provides evidence-based, reliable and understandable medical information to the public. 

Since its launch in 2012, the website has grown to become one of the most visited healthcare websites in the Netherlands with more than 4 million unique page views per month. According to scientific research in the British Medical Journal, the public health site leads to 12 percent less GP consultations and 90% of the GPs in The Netherlands use Thuisarts as a supportive tool during their consultations.

awards.title: Winner Drupal Splash Award 2017 - Espria Digital Work Environment
awards.description:
Espria's Digital Work Environment has won the silver Splash Award 2017. The Splash Awards are the most important prizes for Drupal projects in the Benelux. Drupal agencies and individuals who have achieved extraordinary results get special recognition from inside and outside the Drupal community. 

Espria's Digital Work Environment is an Intranet based on Drupal for one of the largest healthcare organizations in The Netherlands. Since its launch, the Digital Work Environment has become the central hub in the collaborative process of the 20.000 employees of 8 organizations situated at separate locations in The Netherlands.

awards.title: Nominee Dutch Interactive Awards 2017 - My DHL Parcel
awards.description:
My DHL Parcel, an application One Shoe developed for DHL Parcel, is nominated for a Dutch Interactive Award. Dutch Interactive Awards ar the prizes for the best interactive projects of Netherlands.

My DHL Parcel is an advanced web application that merges a large number of existing DHL products into just one advanced yet easy-to-use shipping service. The result is an intuitive web application based on the latest technology for sending large amounts of commercial shipments.

awards.title: Winner Website of the Year 2016  - Thuisarts (GP at home)
awards.description:
Thuisarts is the number one public health information website in the Netherlands. Thuisarts provides evidence-based, reliable and understandable medical information to the public. 

Since its launch in 2012, the website has grown to become one of the most visited healthcare websites in the Netherlands with more than 4 million unique page views per month. According to scientific research in the British Medical Journal, the public health site leads to 12 percent less GP consultations and 90% of the GPs in The Netherlands use Thuisarts as a supportive tool during their consultations. 

The website has won several awards such as The Website of the Year Award, the online annual election of the greatest websites out there.

awards.title: Nominee Dutch Interactive Awards 2016 - Thuismeten
awards.description:
ThuisMeten, an application One Shoe developed for FocusCura, is nominated for a Dutch Interactive Award. The Dutch Interactive Awards ar the prizes for the best interactive projects of Netherlands.

The category "disrupter" of the Dutch Interactive Awards is for game-changing projects: projects that completely dissolve an existing business through a digital application. The independent jury, consisting of heavyweights of the Dutch online world, nominated the ThuisMeetAppapplication One Shoe developed for FocusCura.

Michel van Velde, CEO One Shoe: “We are very pleased with this nomination. This home measurement app enables a totally new way of health care services.”

awards.title: Winner Drupal Splash Award 2016 - DHLexpress.nl
awards.description:
The website DHLExpress.nl, developed by One Shoe, has won the Splash Award for Best Drupal site in the Benelux in the category Tools / Apps.

The Splash Awards are awarded annually to the best Drupal projects and community contributions from Belgium and The Netherlands. Both Drupal agencies and individuals who achieved extraordinary results get a special recognition from the Drupal community and beyond. An international jury selects winners out of hundreds of contestants in several categories. 

DHL Express
DHL Express is the specialist in national and international express shipments. One Shoe completely renewed the website in a responsive and multilingual online environment based on the Drupal 7 CMS. The new DHLExpress.nl features several options for an accelerated delivery of parcels and useful online tools for sending and tracing.

awards.title: Nominee History Online Award 2015 - Liberation Route Europe App
awards.description:
Liberation Route Europe has been nominated for the History Online Award! 

The History Online Award honors the best historical website or app in the Netherlands. With more then 20.000 votes, it is the most popular History Online Award of the Netherlands. 

Liberation Route Europe provides unique stories about Europe's liberation at the touch of a button. Storylines, sights and historic events, all combined in an app for Android and iPhone. This app uses GPS technology to give its users information about the happenings on the road to a free Europe, based on “spots” (locations), biographies and storylines. This way, visitors literally follow the liberators’, or even the oppressors’, steps. This is because the app’s content and the website aim to show each story from both sides. 

With this international remembrance and liberation route our shared history is uniquely made visible, accessible and tangible.

Dutch minister Hennis-Plasschaert finds the Liberation Route Europe ‘a pearl’. “Because of the app it is possible to rediscover the route the allied forces took." She hailed the initiators during her speech in Arromanches. “With this international remembrance and liberation route our shared history is uniquely made visible, accessible and tangible.

Advertising and digital agency One Shoe from Utrecht realized the unique historical app.
awards.issuer: de Koninklijke Bibliotheek, Archieven.nl, het Historisch Nieuwsblad, DE REE archiefsystemen

awards.title: Nominee Best Website of the Year 2014 - Thuisarts (GP at Home)
awards.description: Thuisarts.nl was one of the 12 nominees for website of the year 2014 in the category health. 2.5 years after the launch, Thuisarts.nl is one of the most visited health websites of the Netherlands with 50,000 to 70,000 visits per day and over app 40,000 downloads. I thank the visitors and members for the positive feedback and the many votes, tips and suggestions.

profile_positions.description:
Award winning independent creative director and brand strategist with a strong focus on creating and translating the brand strategy into experiential branding and activation concepts. 

Clients I’ve worked for: ING, Makelaarsland, SHV, Damen Shipyards, Nike, SOS Kinderdorpen, Bongrain, Paturain, Go-Tan, Iglo, Kieskeurig, Eurail, SURFnet, DHL parcel en DHL express and many more.
profile_positions.title: Independent Creative Director and Brand Strategist

profile_positions.description:
As the Managing Director of iO Campus Utrecht, I was responsible for leading a team of 120+ and growing number of talented individuals and overseeing the integration of three agencies. iO digital is a dynamic and innovative organization that delivers an end-to-end proposition for their clients in the Netherlands, Belgium, Sweden and Denmark. 

Key Responsibilities:
- Leadership: lead and inspire a team of 120 colleagues, fostering a positive work environment and promoting collaboration and innovation.
- Integration Management: Strategically plan and execute the integration of three agencies, ensuring a smooth transition and alignment of resources, processes, and goals.
- Business Development: Identify and pursue new business opportunities, forge strategic partnerships, and strengthen relationships with clients and stakeholders.
- Operational Efficiency: Streamline operations and implement processes to optimize productivity and enhance overall organizational performance.
- Talent Management: Recruit, onboard, and develop top talent, providing mentorship and growth opportunities to foster a high-performing team.
- Financial Management: Oversee the budgeting and financial aspects of the organization, ensuring financial responsibility and driving profitability.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director - Campus Utrecht

profile_positions.description:
Owner, Founder & CEO of One Shoe, an award-winning creative & digital agency with a drive for creating impact on the everyday lives of your audience. I sold One Shoe in 2020 to become part of iO. We combined brand strategy with digital strategy, UX, design and development. With more than 50 specialists, we created campaigns and digital solutions that engaged people, inspired action and grew organizations. Clients were ING, Sanofi-Genzyme, Mylan, DHL, G4S, Nuffic, VNO-NCW, Kanker.nl, NHG Thuisarts.nl, Studiekeuze123, iglo, makelaarsland and many others. 

Specialities: Brand Strategy, Digital Strategy, Open Source (Drupal & Laravel) webdevelopment, advertising & communication, mobile marketing & E-health
profile_positions.title: Owner, Founder and CEO One Shoe

profile_positions.description: The Drupal Association is a non-profit organization. It supports the Drupal project and community with funding, infrastructure, and events. Funded by individual and organization members, and by generous sponsors, the Association's mission is to unite a global open source community to build and promote Drupal. Responsibility within the board: strategy, community, governance and marketing.
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description: The Dutch Laravel Foundation (Stichting Laravel) was officially launched on 12 June 2019. The foundation, approved by the founder of the Laravel PHP Framework, Taylor Otwell, will promote the use of the open source framework Laravel in the Netherlands among clients and will promote knowledge sharing between Laravel developers. Responsibility within the board: strategy, community and governance
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description: On oktober 31st of 2012 the Economic Board Utrecht was officialy founded. The Economic Board Utrecht is the lead agency for realizing and executing strategies to enhance Utrecht's position as an (inter)national business centre. We dream, We think, We dare and We do deliver solutions that create value for the local economy. Our mission is to enhance the role of Utrecht, create a sustainable economic growth with vibrant business and good job opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Board Member Economic Board Utrecht

company.name: Uzelf - Utrecht Innovation Ecosystem in Self-management & eHealth

profile_positions.company: Uzelf - Utrecht Innovation Ecosystem in Self-management & eHealth
profile_positions.description:
The Uzelf program aims at: 

Positioning Utrecht as a model region for self-management & eHealth through the development and consolidation of a highly competitive regional open-innovation ecosystem where companies, researchers, policy makers, health professionals, governments and citizens / patients collaborate in user-centered development, implementation and scaling-up of sustainable and groundbreaking products and services in the field of self-management, supported by ICT (eHealth) and solutions from the creative industries. This synergy, knowledge advance and the innovative Utrecht environment will lead to value creation in:

Human Value - Health benefits and autonomy for Utrecht citizens 

Human Capital - Skills. competences and mindsets related to self-management support across actors in the whole ecosystem

Economic Value - Valorization and leverage of self-management products, stimulating regional economy and creation of new jobs in several sectors across the ecosystem (incl. start-ups)
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description: Board member of Creative Connection: a group of leading agencies in the field of product design, design, advertising, interactive and strategy. The goal of Creative Connection is a substantial contribution to the economic strength of Central Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Board Member Creative Connection

profile_positions.description: Drupal Business Foundation Netherlands / Stichting Drupal Bedrijven Nederland actively promotes Drupal in the Netherlands and helps agencies promoting Drupal professionally.
profile_positions.title: Secretary SDBN - Stichting Drupal Bedrijven Nederland

profile_positions.description:
Drupaloverheid is een initiatief om kennis en code te delen rondom het Drupal CMS binnen de Nederlandse overheid. Overheden en Drupal leveranciers werken in dit netwerk samen.

Drupal4gov is an initiative to share knowledge and code of the popular open source content management framework Drupal between the Dutch Government and Drupal agencies.
profile_positions.title: Kernteam Drupal Overheid (drupal4gov)

profile_positions.description: The Advisory Board of UtrechtInc consists of experienced entrepreneurs, investors, bankers and innovation experts. The Committee reviews applications for admission, extension or loans. The Advisory Board of UtrechtInc offers entrepreneurs an independent assessment by different experts. The board also provides useful tips and opens doors that would otherwise remain closed.
profile_positions.title: Member Advisory Board
